Run by the Deputy News Editor for Latin America , Sandra Bernard , and Mexico 's Senior Producer Manuel Carrillo , the five - day course given by Reuters Television journalists was a great success .

A0: the five-day course given by Reuters Television journalists
RelatedSentence: Covering a broad range of skills such as production , research , visualisation , story focus , logistics , video news gathering , scripting and editing for off - air presentation , the course outlined the essential elements of effective television journalism as well as touching on the areas of ethics and legal issues .
Twenty four TV journalists from major television channels in Ecuador , like Ecuavisa , Tele Amazonas , RTV Ecuador , Telerama , Andes TV , Canela TV and Reuters TV Ecuador , took part in the course .
Amongst them two journalists from Ecuavisa Guayaquil who covered their own flight and accommodation costs to attend the training course in the capital Quito .
Amongst them two journalists from Ecuavisa Guayaquil who covered their own flight and accommodation costs to attend the training course in the capital Quito .
Some of the participants reported that it was the first time such a course on television journalism had been offered in the Andean nation .

We developed several modules and exercises on different areas such as breaking news , camera work , editing , social networks , visual investigations , stand - ups , live reporting , lighting , logistics , natural disasters , new video technology as well as UNICEF 'S Rights of the Child reporting guidelines .

RelatedSentence: One of the many highlights was the positive comments received by participating journalists in regards to the journalistic values of those who work at Reuters News .
